name: Fahd

services.title: Back-End Development
services.description: Specializing in creating scalable, secure back-end systems with a focus on data management, API development, and seamless integration with front-end components.

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description: Building responsive, user-friendly interfaces that prioritize functionality and design, ensuring an optimal experience across devices using modern front-end technologies.

services.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
services.description: Experienced in setting up and managing infrastructure with Docker and Docker Compose, deploying microservices, and automating processes to streamline development and deployment workflows.

services.title: System Administration & Linux
services.description: Proficient in Linux system administration and low-level operations, with a strong command of system optimization, security, and scripting for stable and efficient environments.

aboutpara: As an experienced software developer and software engineering student at 1337 coding school (42 Network), I bring a proven track record of delivering scalable, high-impact solutions. My expertise lies in solving complex problems and driving innovation in fast-paced environments. With a strong background in peer-to-peer collaboration, I have honed my ability to lead projects, adapt to emerging challenges, and deliver results that meet both technical and business objectives. I am dedicated to creating efficient, future-proof software that drives success and growth.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
